foods.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
foods.description: Grilled chicken in a creamy tomato-based curry, rich in spices and flavor.

foods.name: Paneer Butter Masala
foods.description: Soft paneer cubes in a luscious and aromatic tomato and cashew nut gravy.

foods.name: Samosa
foods.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced potatoes and peas, a popular savory snack.

foods.name: Rogan Josh
foods.description: Tender meat slow-cooked in a flavorful blend of spices, creating a rich and aromatic curry.

foods.name: Aloo Paratha
foods.description: Whole wheat flatbread stuffed with spiced mashed potatoes, often served with yogurt.

foods.name: Dhokla
foods.description: Steamed fermented lentil cake, typically served as a snack or breakfast item.

foods.name: Butter Chicken
foods.description: Tender chicken in a creamy, mildly spiced tomato-based sauce, a classic North Indian dish.

foods.name: Biryani
foods.description: Fragrant basmati rice with flavorful meat, infused with spices and herbs.

foods.name: Pani Puri
foods.description: Crunchy hollow puris filled with spicy tamarind water, potatoes, and chickpeas.

foods.name: Tandoori Naan
foods.description: Soft and fluffy oven-baked bread, a perfect accompaniment to various Indian dishes.

foods.name: Peking Duck
foods.description: Crispy duck skin wrapped in thin pancakes with hoisin sauce, a Beijing specialty.

foods.name: Kung Pao Chicken
foods.description: Spicy and flavorful Chinese dish with diced chicken, peanuts, and vegetables.

foods.name: Dim Sum
foods.description: Assorted bite-sized dishes, often steamed or fried, showcasing Cantonese culinary excellence.

foods.name: Mapo Tofu
foods.description: Spicy Sichuan dish with silken tofu and minced meat, known for its bold flavors.

foods.name: Hot Pot
foods.description: Communal dining experience featuring a simmering pot of broth for cooking various meats and vegetables.

foods.name: Xiao Long Bao
foods.description: Soup-filled dumplings with delicate wrappers, a Shanghai delicacy.

foods.name: Chow Mein
foods.description: Stir-fried noodles with a mix of vegetables and often meat, a popular Chinese comfort food.

foods.name: Spring Rolls
foods.description: Crispy rolls filled with vegetables, meat, or seafood, a classic Chinese appetizer.

foods.name: Dan Dan Noodles
foods.description: Spicy Sichuan noodles with minced meat, peanuts, and a flavorful sauce.

foods.name: Char Siu Bao
foods.description: Steamed buns filled with savory barbecue-flavored pork, a Cantonese delight.

foods.name: Sushi
foods.description: Delicate rice and fresh seafood, expertly crafted into bite-sized delights, a quintessential Japanese culinary experience.

foods.name: Ramen
foods.description: Japanese noodle soup with flavorful broth, noodles, and various toppings, a beloved comfort food.

foods.name: Tempura
foods.description: Lightly battered and deep-fried seafood or vegetables, showcasing Japanese culinary finesse.

foods.name: Matcha Green Tea
foods.description: Finely ground green tea leaves, known for its vibrant color and unique, earthy flavor profile.

foods.name: Yakitori
foods.description: Grilled skewers of chicken, often seasoned with tare sauce, a popular izakaya dish.

foods.name: Udon
foods.description: Thick wheat noodles in a savory broth, often served with various toppings.

foods.name: Okonomiyaki
foods.description: Savory pancake with a variety of ingredients, typically including cabbage, meat, and a special sauce.

foods.name: Chawanmushi
foods.description: Silky steamed egg custard with ingredients like chicken, shrimp, and vegetables, a delicate appetizer.

foods.name: Sashimi
foods.description: Fresh, thinly sliced raw fish or seafood, served without rice, emphasizing the purity of flavors.

foods.name: Tonkatsu
foods.description: Breaded and deep-fried pork cutlet, typically served with shredded cabbage and tonkatsu sauce.

foods.name: Kimchi
foods.description: Fermented vegetables, usually cabbage, with spicy and tangy flavors, a staple in Korean cuisine.

foods.name: Bibimbap
foods.description: Korean mixed rice dish with vegetables, meat, and a spicy sauce, offering a harmonious blend of flavors.

foods.name: Samgyeopsal
foods.description: Grilled pork belly slices, often enjoyed with a variety of accompaniments like garlic and ssamjang.

foods.name: Japchae
foods.description: Stir-fried glass noodles with vegetables and sometimes beef, offering a delightful and chewy texture.

foods.name: Tteokbokki
foods.description: Spicy rice cakes in a sweet and savory gochujang sauce, a popular street food in Korea.

foods.name: Kimchi Jjigae
foods.description: Hearty and spicy Korean stew made with kimchi, tofu, and pork or beef, a comforting dish.

foods.name: Haemul Pajeon
foods.description: Korean seafood pancake with green onions, a crispy delight enjoyed with a dipping sauce.

foods.name: Dolsot Bibimbap
foods.description: Bibimbap served in a hot stone pot, creating a crispy layer of rice, a popular variation.

foods.name: Banchan
foods.description: Assorted side dishes served with rice, offering a variety of flavors and textures in Korean meals.

foods.name: Yukgaejang
foods.description: Spicy beef soup with vegetables, often featuring shredded beef and a flavorful broth.

foods.name: Pho
foods.description: Vietnamese noodle soup with aromatic broth, herbs, and meat, creating a harmonious and flavorful bowl.

foods.name: Banh Mi
foods.description: Vietnamese sandwich with a perfect fusion of French and Vietnamese ingredients, a delightful street food.

foods.name: Bun Cha
foods.description: Grilled pork patties and vermicelli noodles served with herbs and a flavorful dipping sauce, a Hanoi specialty.

foods.name: Goi Cuon
foods.description: Fresh spring rolls filled with shrimp, herbs, and vermicelli, offering a light and healthy Vietnamese appetizer.

foods.name: Com tam
foods.description: Broken rice with grilled pork, a popular Southern Vietnamese dish known for its unique texture and flavors.

foods.name: Ca Kho To
foods.description: Caramelized fish in a clay pot, featuring a sweet and savory sauce, a traditional Vietnamese delicacy.

foods.name: Mi Quang
foods.description: Turmeric-infused noodle dish with shrimp, pork, and fresh herbs, a specialty from Central Vietnam.

foods.name: Banh Xeo
foods.description: Crispy Vietnamese crepes filled with shrimp, pork, and bean sprouts, served with fresh herbs.

foods.name: Hu Tieu
foods.description: Clear noodle soup with a flavorful broth, typically featuring seafood, pork, and herbs.

foods.name: Banh Cuon
foods.description: Steamed rice rolls filled with minced pork and wood ear mushrooms, served with dipping sauce.
